text: 'ahali allah lakum -'ayaha almuslimuna- fi hal 'iihramikum sayd albahri, wahu ma yusad minh hyana, watieamuha: wahu almayit minha; min ajl antifaeikum bih muqimin 'aw musafirina, wahurim ealaykum sayd albarr ma dumtumu muhrimin bihajin 'aw eamratan. wakhshawa allah wanafidhuu jmye awamirh, wajtanibuu jmye nawahiha; hataa tzfaru bieazim thawabihi, wtaslmu min 'alim eiqabah eindama tuhsharun lilhisab waljaza'a
